PerfectNetExp.abs: 以l开头的英语英文单词 ... litmus 石蕊（蓝色染料） litotes 间接肯定法,曲言法 litre 升(容量单位).
间接肯定法（litotes）（Litotes），既双重否定表示肯定，例如“not bad”、 “not much”、 “you are not wrong”，经常被使用。置小词（diminutives…
反语-的英语翻译-bab.la词典 ... 用反语的 ironic 反语法 litotes 用反语的 ironical.
propound的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... scholiast 注释者, 评注者... litotes 反叙法, 曲言法.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: via late Latin from Greek litotēs, from litos 'plain, meagre'

means.word_mean: 1. understatement for rhetorical effect (especially when expressing an affirmative by negating its contrary);

sentences.sentence: "saying `I was not a little upset' when you mean `I was very upset' is an example of litotes"
